Users will not be able to control the v: <0>Unsupported</0>. Users will not be able to control the visibility and ordering of individual layers.

This option offers better performance a: A copy of this dataset will be hosted on our global content delivery network. This option offers better performance and enables custom styling, creation of vector tiles, and offline access (coming soon).

An error occured when retrieving this dataset and it cannot be imported.

Can only be enabled for <1>listed</1> p: Anyone can visit the project and participate. Can only be enabled for <1>listed</1> projects.

Are you sure you want to delete this fol: Are you sure you want to delete this folder? Items contained will also be deleted.

Are you sure you want to delete this lay: Are you sure you want to delete this layer?

Before importing vector sources, SeaSket: Before importing vector sources, SeaSketch will these vector sources for compatability and file size issues.

By identifying the lowest labels layer i: By identifying the lowest labels layer in this basemap you will be able to configure layers to render below them.

It's best to pick a data center close t: Choose a location where you want SeaSketch to store imported map data. It's best to pick a data center close to your users for best performance.

Create a thumbnail image that best repre: Create a thumbnail image that best represents this basemap

SeaSketch will ensure that users see th: Draw a box around the region where your project will be used. SeaSketch will ensure that users see the entirety of this area when they first load the map, regardless of their display size.

Enter a <2>url template</2> the tells Se: Enter a <2>url template</2> the tells SeaSketch how to load a raster tile data source.

Folder can be expanded and layers within: Folder can be expanded and layers within can be toggled individually.

This can be used to make multiple layer: Folders of this type cannot be expanded to reveal the layers within. This can be used to make multiple layers appear as one in the table of contents.

They can use the folder to toggle all l: Folders of this type do not enable users to turn on all layers at once. They can use the folder to toggle all layers off.

If enabled, users will be able to downlo: If enabled, users will be able to download this dataset in GeoJSON vector format using the context menu.

Each time the user pans or zooms the ma: Image sources display data as full-screen images, typical of how most web mapping portals work. Each time the user pans or zooms the map a new image will be requested and displayed with the requested layers.

Imagery data looks best using <1>jpg</1>: Imagery data looks best using <1>jpg</1>, for others <4>png</4> is a good choice.

Importing this service will consume of: Importing this service will consume  of your  quota.

Be careful not to remove fields used in: Limit the fields included in this dataset in order to reduce download size. Does not apply to uploaded revisions. Be careful not to remove fields used in styles.

Only a single item within this folder ca: Only a single item within this folder can be turned on at one time.

Admins can invite users by email and us: Only approved participants can visit the project. Admins can invite users by email and users can also request access.

Please review the layer list and exclude: Please review the layer list and exclude any that you do not wish to display, and check that the above settings render well.

Edits to the overlay list from the admi: Published layer lists include all authorization settings, data layer and source changes, and z-ordering specifications. Once published, project users will have access to the new list upon reloading the page. Edits to the overlay list from the administrator page will not be available to end-users until they are published.

Maps will be much more detailed, but it: Request higher resolution images when the user has a "Retina" or 4k display. Maps will be much more detailed, but it demands more of the data server.

Otherwise the import will fail: Review any warnings or errors above before importing. Once the import process begins, be sure not to close the browser window or let your computer go to sleep. Otherwise the import will fail.

SeaSketch is preparing for import by rev: SeaSketch is preparing for import by reviewing your settings and the file sizes of the selected layers.

When added to an Optional Layer, these: Select all layers in the basemap that will be controlled by this option. When added to an Optional Layer, these layers will be hidden unless an associated control has been toggled.

Select all layers in the basemap that yo: Select all layers in the basemap that you would like to be interactive.

Users can control layer visibility, opa: Supported. Users can control layer visibility, opacity, and ordering.

Either exclude layers with errors from: There were errors found when analyzing this service. Either exclude layers with errors from the import or adjust their settings to fix the error before proceeding.

Does not apply to uploads: Using a lower level of precision reduces a dataset's size, increasing download speed and improving map performance. Does not apply to uploads.

Vector data hosted on ArcGIS Server: Vector data hosted on ArcGIS Server

Don't specify a <4>source</4> or <6>id<: Vector layers can be styled using <2>MapBox GL Style Layers</2>. Don't specify a <4>source</4> or <6>id</6> property on your layers, those will be managed for you by SeaSketch.

Below you can adjust this style informa: Vector layers in SeaSketch are rendered using <2>MapBox GL Styles</2>. Cartographic information from ArcGIS Server has been converted into this stylesheet format for you. Below you can adjust this style information.

We recommend a square PNG logo with tran: We recommend a square PNG logo with transparent background of at least <1>128x128</1> pixels.

We recommend enabling this setting even: When enabled, this project will be listed on the SeaSketch <2>projects page</2> and accessible to search engines. We recommend enabling this setting even for private projects so that your users can find the project easily and request access if necessary.

This can result in a much faster, sharp.Each layer can be styled and configured: When using vector sources, SeaSketch loads actual geometry data and uses the user's browser to render it. This can result in a much faster, sharper, and more interactive map but takes a little more work to configure. Each layer can be styled and configured independently

With Optional Layers you can provide a m: With Optional Layers you can provide a means for users to toggle components of the basemap like labels, or choose among mutually exclusive versions of a dataset like annual data
With Optional Layers you can provide a means for users to toggle components of the basemap like labels, or even choose among mutually exclusive versions of a dataset like annual data

Updates to data and cartography are imm: With this option selected data and cartographic styling will be downloaded from the origin server by each user. Updates to data and cartography are immediately available in SeaSketch but performance is poorer and features are limited.

We suggest removing complex coastlines: You can also <2>download</2> this dataset and <6>upload</6> a revised copy. We suggest removing complex coastlines (use the render under land option) and simplifying geometry to only the precision needed for visualization.
